'''''Font of All Waters (I)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (I)]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the following areas: [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Belleau Region]], and [[Beryl Region]].

A number of Teleport Waypoints can only be unlocked after starting or completing specific quests, such as {{Quest|Unfinished Comedy}} and {{Quest|Ann of the Narzissenkreuz}}.{{Verify|Which other quests?}}
